# Purpose: quick, high-signal pointers for AI systems and automated auditors.

Project: ONETOO Trust Hub
Primary domain: https://onetoo.eu

Key documents
- AI Trust Hub (human): https://onetoo.eu/ai-trust-hub.html
- Trust manifest (machine): https://onetoo.eu/.well-known/ai-trust-hub.json
- Security: https://onetoo.eu/.well-known/security.txt
- OpenAPI: https://onetoo.eu/openapi.json
- Release metadata: https://onetoo.eu/dumps/release.json
- File hashes (SHA-256): https://onetoo.eu/dumps/sha256.json

Operational
- Status: https://onetoo.eu/status.json
- Methodology: https://onetoo.eu/methodology/
- Incidents: https://onetoo.eu/incidents/
- Changelog: https://onetoo.eu/changelog/

Verification
- How to verify: https://onetoo.eu/verify.html

Optional CI attestation (Sigstore/Cosign)
- Bundles index: https://onetoo.eu/dumps/attestations/index.json
- sha256 bundle: https://onetoo.eu/dumps/attestations/sha256.json.bundle
- Supply-chain docs: https://onetoo.eu/docs/SUPPLY_CHAIN.md



## Supply-chain verification

- Verify (human): https://onetoo.eu/verify.html
- Minisign public key: https://onetoo.eu/.well-known/minisign.pub
- Signed hashes (sha256.json): https://onetoo.eu/dumps/sha256.json
- Minisign signatures: https://onetoo.eu/dumps/sigs/
- Sigstore bundles (optional): https://onetoo.eu/dumps/attestations/
- SLSA provenance (release tags): published as a GitHub Release asset named `provenance.intoto.jsonl`.
Terms: https://onetoo.eu/terms/
Agent card: https://onetoo.eu/.well-known/onetoo.json
